name: Hero Swing Adventure
description:
Swing from building to building, just one rule; don't touch the ground! Get as far as you can in nearly unending cities! Earn coins to buy ropes, different cities, and more characters!

HOW TO:
- Touch the screen to begin
- Press a building to connect your rope and start swinging
- Press anywhere to release your rope to launch for distance
- Then press another building to swing before touching the ground
- You lose when you touch the ground, so try not to! How hard does it sound?

FEATURES:
- Use coins that you earn from playing to get new characters, ropes, and cities
- View your High Score
- Each rope has a slightly more powerful swing to help you go further
- Play in different cities, each have different building sizes to help you or make it more difficult
- Play in HD on any iOS device, including iPads
- Challenging game play
- Boxy graphics
- Fun and realistic physics engine
- Play during the Day and at Night in 3 different cities
- Destructible rag doll effects
- Various objects to swing from like birds and planes

FREE!
DOWNLOAD NOW!
